content.content: Preamble Title: BlockTower Credit Monthly Arranger Report Period: 2/1/2023 - 2/28/2023 Posted: 2/28/2023 Author: @BlockTower Tags: @Recognized-Delegates @Aes @roo Ilks: RWA010-A, RWA011-A, RWA012-A, RWA013-A   References  BlockTower Credit (Arranger) Collateral Onboarding Application BlockTower Credit - Commercial and Legal Risk Assessment - Part I BlockTower Credit - Commercial and Legal Risk Assessment - Part II BlockTower Credit Legal Transaction Documents   Executive Summary During this reporting period, we financed 6 Structured Credit assets within the Consumer and Marketplace Lending, Credit Card, and Receivables Financing sectors, totaling over $30M in value.
